name: carbon-web-components-next-getting-started
description: Sample project for getting started with the Web Components from the Carbon Design System with Next.js.

scripts.start: echo 'Running Next in Node 18.15.0+. If you have such Node version in your system just `next` here will work.' && NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider ./node_modules/node/node_modules/.bin/node ./node_modules/.bin/next
